## [**RaukR** â€¢ Summer School 2023]{.large}
### Advanced R for Bioinformatics
##### 11-22 June 2023, Visby, Gotland, Sweden.

<br>

In Life Sciences and Bioinformatics, R programming language is increasingly being used to transform and analyse data, perform statistical analysis and produce publication-ready visualisations. This workshop aims to take the participants beyond the basics of R to a deeper and comprehensive understanding of the R ecosystem.

This workshop is organised by the National Bioinformatics Infrastructure, Sweden (NBIS). NBIS is a platform of the Science for Life Laboratory (SciLifeLab). The event is organised in co-operation with Uppsala University, Lund University and Stockholm University, Sweden.
